alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:33AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Bruce. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, the right bank overflows flooding agricultural lands for as much as 1/4 mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Wednesday was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Bruce 8.0 9.5 Wed 9 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
